and active=${condition.active}
mapper.update: UPDATE wf_processnode SET pid = #{pId}, code=#{code}, sort=#{sort}, url=#{url}, updateid=${updateid}, updatetime=sysdate() WHERE id = ${id}
mapper.select: select t.id,t.pid as pid,t.url,t.code,sort,g.name as text,0 as selected,g.id as gid from wf_processnode t inner join (select id,name,tableid from globalization where tablename='wf_processnode' and tablecolumn='name' and language=#{lang} ) as g on g.tableid=t.id order by t.sort
